.. _firststeps:

===========
First steps
===========

Web interface URL:

.. code-block:: console

    http://localhost:5200

if ``create_root_user`` in ``/etc/snooze/core.yaml`` has not been set to **false**, login credentials are ``root:root``

Otherwise, it is always possible to generate a root token that can be used for **JWT Token** authentication method if `Snooze Client <https://github.com/snoozeweb/snooze_client>`_ is installed:

.. code-block:: console

    $ snooze root-token
    # Run with root or snooze user
    Root token: eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VyIjp7Im...
